Uses of Class
js.core.JsGlobal

Packages that use JsGlobal
js Opaque classes and interfaces necessary to simulate JavaScript features, and internal classes for simulative implementation. 
js.core Opaque classes simulating core JavaScript objects. 
js.dom Opaque classes and interfaces simulating client-side DOM. 
js.user Opaque classes simulating client-side JavaScript objects. 
 

Uses of JsGlobal in js
 

Methods in js that return JsGlobal
static JsGlobal Js.core()
          Opaquely gets the JavaScript Global object with the core support only.
protected abstract  JsGlobal Sim.core()
          Returns the opaque global object with the core support only.
 

Uses of JsGlobal in js.core
 

Methods in js.core that return JsGlobal
 JsGlobal JsGlobal.Member.with(ObjectLike o)
          Evaluates the property, represented by the current member instance, of the argument object.
 

Uses of JsGlobal in js.dom
 

Subclasses of JsGlobal in js.dom
static class DOM.Window.Prototype
          An opaque class representing the prototype of the enclosing global class of JavaScript.
 

Uses of JsGlobal in js.user
 

Subclasses of JsGlobal in js.user
 class JsClient
          An opaque class representing the JavaScript Global object with the full client-side support.
 class JsWin
          An opaque class representing the current global JsWindow object of JavaScript client-side.
 class JsWindow
          An opaque class representing JavaScript client-side objects of the global JsClient.Window class.
